ComicInfo.Summary:
The final conclusion to the series.
In the gripping final conclusion of VR XOXO, Akari's world has been turned upside down. She discovers Itsumi and the A.I. background character, Eshima, together as a couple which
triggers an unexpected and violent reaction from her. Feeling heartbroken and betrayed by her old childhood friend, Akari's behavior becomes increasingly erratic and dangerous.
Meanwhile, Kiko and Shizuka grow more concerned for their friend and decide to intervene. They revisit Hidiyoshi’s arcade hoping they can catch Akari and help her regain her composure before it’s too late. As the story unfolds, Akari and Itsumi’s long term friendship is put to the ultimate test, leading to an exchange that will change their lives forever.
